xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/68555-Death Note Relight 2: L's Successors 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qDhbGqjZ7yFwa7FMIzuiQTQMfEQ.jpg After the events of the first movie Yagami Light faces two new adversaries as he is trying to create a perfect world without crime or criminals. This movie continues the first tv special and is a summary of the last 12 episodes of the tv anime Death Note Relight 2: L's Successors
